title: Create comprehensive project initialization and onboarding guide
description:
Create a comprehensive guide and automation for initializing a new project using the Glorious Agents framework from scratch.

OVERVIEW:
Users need a clear, step-by-step guide and automated tooling to quickly set up the Glorious Agents framework for a new project. This includes installation, configuration, initial project structure, skill setup, and best practices.

DELIVERABLES:

1. QUICKSTART.md - Fast-track guide (5-10 minutes)
2. GETTING_STARTED.md - Comprehensive onboarding guide
3. agent init - Interactive initialization command
4. PROJECT_TEMPLATES.md - Template documentation
5. Video/GIF Demos (optional)

QUICKSTART.md CONTENT:
- Prerequisites (Python 3.11+, Git)
- Installation (uv/pip/pipx)
- Database initialization
- First project creation
- Essential skills installation
- Quick reference commands

GETTING_STARTED.MD CONTENT:
- What is Glorious Agents?
- Prerequisites
- Installation methods
- Configuration (.env, AGENT_FOLDER)
- Project initialization (interactive vs manual)
- Core concepts (skills, projects, events, universal search)
- Your first project (step-by-step example)
- Installing skills
- Common workflows (daily dev, research, release)
- Troubleshooting

AGENT INIT COMMAND:
Interactive wizard for project setup:
1. Database initialization
2. Project creation with prompts
3. Skill selection (checkbox)
4. Sample data generation
5. Validation and health check
6. Next steps summary

PROJECT TEMPLATES:
1. fastapi-app - FastAPI application
2. python-library - Python package
3. research - Research project
4. documentation - Documentation project

Each template includes:
- Initial resources
- Setup issues
- Workflow templates
- Configuration

EXAMPLE WORKFLOWS IN DOCS:
- Daily development workflow
- Research workflow
- Release workflow
- Housekeeping workflow

TROUBLESHOOTING SECTION:
- Database not found
- Skill not found
- Permission errors
- Import errors

SUCCESS METRICS:
- User can go from zero to first project in < 10 minutes
- Clear documentation with examples
- Interactive wizard handles common cases
- Templates provide quick starts

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
✅ QUICKSTART.md covers 5-minute setup
✅ GETTING_STARTED.md comprehensive guide
✅ agent init command working
✅ At least 3 project templates
✅ Installation tested on Linux, macOS, Windows
✅ All examples verified and working
✅ Troubleshooting section covers common issues
